data.text:
Van Vogt, A.E.

Slan

Sauk City. WI: Arkham House, 1946. 1st Edition. Hardcover. Fine / Very Good. Item #014733

Small 8vo., 216pp. Beautiful First Printing, one of 4051 copies. Square, tight and clean throughout with little or no wear. A hint of page toning. Very well-preserved. Very attractive unclipped, dust-jacket, ($2.50) has a toned spine and folds as is almost always found on this title. A few tiny nicks at the spine ends and some rubbing along the spine. Still is fresh and bright with no creases or tears. A sharp collectable copy of the author's first novel and first publication in book form. (Jaffrey - Horrors and Unpleasantries - pg. 31-32).
